summary:
**Myst: An Adventure Game Summary**

Myst is an adventure game created by Rand and Robyn Miller, released in 1993 for Macintosh. Players travel to a mysterious island called Myst through a special book. They solve puzzles by interacting with objects and exploring the environment. Completing puzzles lets players visit other worlds, uncovering the game's story and deciding whom to help.

The game was designed to be graphically impressive with a complex story for adults. It was limited by the technology of the time but still became a huge success. Myst sold over six million copies, making it the best-selling PC game for nearly a decade. It influenced many other games and media.
title: Myst
